attributes.additional_details:
The public is now more aware how damaging the Brexit consequences will be to our personal lives, businesses and many other European relationships that have started to suffer already. A majority of us want the UK to remain within the European Union, and for another Referendum to take place as soon as possible in order to stop Brexit. 

Please sign and share.
attributes.background:
Hold a second Brexit referendum.

Numerous polls over past year have revealed that if another Brexit Referendum takes place majority will vote to 'Remain' in the European Union (i.e. A 14-15 November 2018 YouGov survey showed 54% would now vote 'Remain').
